data.description:
Reducept game is available for patients exclusively via prescription by our medical partners. Please check our website www.reducept.nl to see if your practitioner is part of our program and can offer you the Reducept Method as part of your treatment. We are continuously growing our network to make Reducept easily accessible by anyone in need of pain relief.

Reducept offers you a digital psychological pain treatment without barrier. The treatment is in the form of science-based education and brain-training techniques. We help you to reduce your pain and improve the quality of your life via the Reducept Method. A core element of this method is our award-winning serious game targeted at people suffering from chronic pain. The game will educate you about pain through the virtualization of your body. Playfully adopt cognitive techniques to train your brain to create its own pain medicine.

REDUCEPT IS FOR YOU IF 
- Your practitioner uses Reducept as part of your pain therapy
- You are tired of chronic pain and wish to relieve it to improve the quality of your life in the long run
- You would like to be able to influence pain by yourself
- You strive to understand better why you are in pain
- You need a supportive community to feel you are not alone in your pain

Includes icons made by Eucalyp from www.flaticon.com

changelog.change_log:
Added
- The first time a user logs in the app will be displayed in the same language as specified in their dashboard account
- When having finished the story or education mode a pop-up will be shown to designate the end of the session

Fixed
- Made it harder as a patient to accidentally log out
- Fixed the pain scale gradient not fitting the number line
- Getting stuck at the pain decreased panel when using a Norwegian language for the deviceâ€™s operating system

Removed
- Story progression indicators
- Member page section in the main menu
